name: Beat Wave Shooter
description:
Synth Wave Shooter is a twin stick shooter where the second stick is broken and the direction of your projectiles is out of the players control.

The player automatically fires to the beat of the music to make it more chaotic.
The goal of the game is to score as high as possible before getting overwhelmed by the invading enemies.

This is currently just a prototype of our first ever Game project.
